# bzip2 Library

This directory should contain the bzip2 1.0.8 source files.

## Required Files

Download bzip2 source from: https://sourceware.org/bzip2/

Required source files:
- blocksort.c
- huffman.c
- crctable.c
- randtable.c
- compress.c
- decompress.c
- bzlib.c
- bzlib.h (already provided)
- bzlib_private.h (already provided)
